Text:
I tried to follow YIFY's format exactly (but making all the relevant adjustments for this specific torrent as possible), however, I did goof on the title…it should read:

"Tarzan (1999) 720p BrRip x264 - 600MB - YIFY"

I would delete it and re-up the torrent, but I explicitly wanted to use the SAME exact torrent file as available from YIFYs site...and TPB guidelines say that I would not be able to re-up the exact same torrent.

All that being said, here's YIFYs "official" 720p version of Tarzan (with an abridged title, and posted here to TBP by me, instead.)

Enjoy! ;)
